name: Piercing Blow
summary:
Piercing Blow is one of world’s most popular FPS game played by 100 million users in 70 countries. This Free 2 Play online FPS (First-person shooter) is a fast-paced and easily enjoyed game. You can opt to personalize the character with massive selection of weapons, partial suits and character skins.
 
The skill system will allow players to feel the sense of achievements of level-ups just like MMORPGs. The combinations of weapons, suits and skills can be uniquely customized for each player’s battle tactics.
